Once upon a time, in a vast desert, there lived a peculiar penguin named Percy. Stranded after a wild storm swept him far from home, Percy learned to adapt. He fashioned a sun hat from palm leaves to shield his eyes from the blinding sun and discovered a love for cactus fruit, which quenched his thirst. Despite the heat, Percy wiggled and waddled through the dunes, becoming friends with the local lizards. One day, a kind-hearted traveler spotted him and decided to take him back to the icy shores of Antarctica. But Percy smiled, realizing he had found a new home.
